title: Wokal Distance's Twitter War against Post-Modernity
description:
Wokal Distance sent me a DM a bit ago wondering when would be a good time for us to chat. We've been keeping an eye on each other's work for a while and after he released this tweet (which he reads unprompted in the interview) I thought it would be a good time. Here's our conversation. 

https://twitter.com/wokal_distance/status/1431539171676413953
https://threadreaderapp.com/thread/1431539171676413953.html

Discord link. Good for just a few days. Check with more recent videos for a fresh link. https://discord.gg/De8gqfJW
Vanderklips channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCX0jIcadtoxELSwehCh5QTg

My Substack https://paulvanderklay.substack.com/

Estuary Hub Link  https://www.estuaryhub.com/

If you want to schedule a one-on-one conversation check here. https://paulvanderklay.me/2019/08/06/converzations-with-pvk/
